..release-notes-header:
## Overview

**dotbox-mcp** is an MCP server that enables Claude and other LLM agents to execute .NET code in isolated Docker containers. This release marks the first stable 1.0 version with production-ready features.

## Key Features

- Execute C# snippets and full .NET projects (.NET 8, 9, 10 RC2)
- Host web APIs with accessible endpoints
- Test NuGet packages in isolated environments
- Cross-platform support (macOS, Linux, Windows)
